@RoseXrp @ofnumbers @JedMcCaleb Forward progress was stalled because the system SUCCESSFULLY worked as designed. Both #XLM and $XRP prioritize correctness over liveliness.  As somebody who’s had to sweat it through a weekend waiting for a #BTC txn, it’s weird to see people freaking out over a 2 hour delay.

What happened to XLM can theoretically also happen to XRP if somehow somebody disables all the ripple servers.  This has been known from the beginning of time, but Ripple is very close to no longer being this threat. 1/2
